import MethodEndpoint from "@theme/ApiExplorer/MethodEndpoint";
import ParamsDetails from "@theme/ParamsDetails";
import RequestSchema from "@theme/RequestSchema";
import StatusCodes from "@theme/StatusCodes";
import OperationTabs from "@theme/OperationTabs";
import TabItem from "@theme/TabItem";
import Heading from "@theme/Heading";

<Heading
  as={"h1"}
  className={"openapi__heading"}
  children={"Create an extension"}
>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"post"}
  path={"/api/v1/domains/{domain_uuid}/extensions"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Creates a new extension in the specified domain.

Notes:
- Some fields are defaulted server-side (e.g., effective caller-id, voicemail defaults) based on your internal request logic.
- Returns the created extension object.

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={[{"in":"path","name":"domain_uuid","description":"The domain UUID.","example":"4018f7a3-8e0a-47bb-9f4f-04b1313e0e1b","required":true,"schema":{"type":"string"}}]}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={{"required":true,"content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","properties":{"extension":{"type":"number","description":"Numeric extension number.","example":1001},"directory_first_name":{"type":"string","description":"First name for directory display. Must not be greater than 60 characters.","example":"Front"},"directory_last_name":{"type":"string","description":"Last name for directory display. Must not be greater than 60 characters.","example":"Desk"},"voicemail_mail_to":{"type":"string","description":"Email address for voicemail-to-email notifications. Must be a valid email address. Must not be greater than 255 characters.","example":"frontdesk@example.com"},"voicemail_sms_to":{"type":"string","description":"Optional SMS destination for voicemail alerts. .","example":"+12135551212"},"description":{"type":"string","description":"Optional description/label.","example":"Main reception phone"},"suspended":{"type":"boolean","description":"Whether the extension is suspended. Defaults to false if omitted.","example":false},"do_not_disturb":{"type":"boolean","description":"Enable Do Not Disturb for this extension. Defaults to false if omitted.","example":false},"enabled":{"type":"boolean","description":"Whether the extension is enabled. Defaults to true if omitted.","example":true},"call_timeout":{"type":"string","description":"Ring timeout in seconds. Defaults to 25.","example":"25"},"directory_visible":{"type":"boolean","description":"Whether this user is visible in the directory (dial-by-name). Defaults to true if omitted.","example":true},"directory_exten_visible":{"type":"boolean","description":"Whether the extension number is visible in the directory (dial-by-name). Defaults to true if omitted.","example":true},"user_record":{"type":"boolean","description":"Whether call recording is enabled. Defaults to null if omitted.","example":true},"call_screen_enabled":{"type":"boolean","description":"Whether call screening is enabled. Defaults to false if omitted.","example":false},"max_registrations":{"type":"string","description":"Maximum allowed SIP registrations for this extension. Defaults to null if omitted.","example":"1"},"limit_max":{"type":"string","description":"Max number of allowed outgoing calls. Defaults to 5 if omitted.","example":"5"},"limit_destination":{"type":"string","description":"Limit destination. Defaults to !USER_BUSY if omitted.","example":"!USER_BUSY"},"toll_allow":{"type":"string","description":"Toll allow string (e.g., domestic,international,local). Defaults to null if omitted.","example":"domestic"},"call_group":{"type":"string","description":"Call group string. A user in a call group can perform a call pickup (or an intercept) of a ringing phone belonging to another user who is also in the call group. Defaults to null if omitted.","example":"sales"},"hold_music":{"type":"string","description":"Music on hold source/category. Defaults to null if omitted.","example":"local_stream://default"},"cidr":{"type":"string","description":"CIDR/network restriction (if used by your security/dialplan rules). Defaults to null if omitted.","example":"192.168.1.0/24"},"sip_force_contact":{"type":"string","description":"SIP force-contact setting.","example":"NDLB-connectile-dysfunction"},"sip_force_expires":{"type":"string","description":"SIP force-expires setting.","example":"300"},"sip_bypass_media":{"type":"string","description":"SIP bypass-media setting. Defaults to null if omitted.","example":"false"},"mwi_account":{"type":"string","description":"MWI account string.","example":"1001@your-domain.com"},"absolute_codec_string":{"type":"string","description":"Absolute codec string.","example":"PCMU,PCMA,OPUS"},"dial_string":{"type":"string","description":"Custom dial string.","example":"{sip_invite_domain=${domain_name}}${sofia_contact(${dialed_user}@${dialed_domain})}"},"force_ping":{"type":"string","description":"Force ping setting. Defaults to false if omitted.","example":"true"},"auth_acl":{"type":"string","description":"Auth ACL name (if used for registration/auth restrictions). Defaults to null if omitted.","example":"localnet"},"outbound_caller_id_number":{"type":"string","description":"Outbound caller ID number (E.164 recommended).","example":"+12135551212"},"emergency_caller_id_number":{"type":"string","description":"Emergency caller ID number (E.164 recommended).","example":"+12135559876"},"outbound_caller_id_name":{"type":"string","description":"Outbound caller ID name.","example":"Front Desk"},"emergency_caller_id_name":{"type":"string","description":"Emergency caller ID name.","example":"Front Desk"},"voicemail_enabled":{"type":"boolean","description":"Whether voicemail should be created/enabled. If true, a voicemail box will be created. If false, no voicemail box is created.","example":true},"voicemail_id":{"type":"string","description":"","example":null},"voicemail_file":{"type":"string","description":"Voicemail delivery mode (e.g., attach). Defaults to \"attach\" if omitted.","example":"attach"},"voicemail_local_after_email":{"type":"boolean","description":"Whether to keep voicemail local after emailing it. Defaults to true if omitted.","example":true},"voicemail_transcription_enabled":{"type":"boolean","description":"Whether voicemail transcription is enabled. Defaults to true if omitted.","example":true},"voicemail_description":{"type":"string","description":"Optional voicemail description/label.","example":"Front Desk Voicemail"},"voicemail_destinations":{"type":"object","description":"","example":null,"properties":{}},"voicemail_password":{"type":"number","description":"Voicemail PIN/password. If omitted, defaults to the extension number unless password complexity is enabled (then a random PIN is generated).","example":1001},"voicemail_tutorial":{"type":"boolean","description":"Whether voicemail tutorial is enabled. Defaults to true if omitted.","example":true},"voicemail_recording_instructions":{"type":"boolean","description":"Whether voicemail recording instructions are enabled. Defaults to true if omitted.","example":true}},"required":["extension","directory_first_name","voicemail_enabled"]}}}}}
>
  
</RequestSchema>
